content.p: Dr. Hilary Collins, Outreach Coordinator School of Pharmacy, 0115 84 67728 Office Psychology Building C28, East Drive. Address Pharmacy School Building, East Drive,University Park, Nottingham NG7 2RD, United Kingdom. The School of Pharmacy is involved in a wide range of outreach activities both with local schools and the wider community. These activities aim to promote a public interest in science and encourage young people to pursue a career in the field. Here you can find our involvement and work with: Advice for members of the public and School of Pharmacy staff who would like to be involved in outreach activities. For all enquiries please visit: www.nottingham.ac.uk/enquiry
